institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 34 (Establishment of Competition)
contents: Article 34 (Establishment of Competition) The requirements for competition establishment by occupation in local competitions shall be met when the participation applications of 4 or more people are received from 4 or more city/provincial committees for each occupation for the occupation to be conducted. However, if the competition is Among the established occupations, the chairperson of the city/provincial committee may decide whether or not to hold a competition for an occupation for which less than four people have received participation applications, taking into account the supply and demand environment of athletes in the relevant region.
